A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Where to begin? This movie was a total train wreck. Awkward attempts at humor pulled you out of the movie without anyone in the audience actually laughing. Ruins a decades long legacy of who Luke Skywalker is and what it is to be a Jedi. Makes the Lucas prequels look like Genius filmmaking. Congrats Disney...you can have the franchise and turn it into nothing more than a base cash grab.
